title: Family pleas for help after son attacked stepping off school bus | The KiddChris Show | X101.5
text:
Family pleas for help after son attacked stepping off school bus posted by The KiddChris Show - 5 hours ago 
Via DailyMail 
The family of a bullied schoolboy have released shocking pictures of his swollen and bloodied face after he was attacked when he got off a bus. 
These shocking images show how the 15-year-old was left bloodied and with a huge swelling to the right side of his face after the assault on his way home from school. 
The youngster suffered two fat lips and was taken to hospital with a suspected broken jaw. 
Family friend Sarah Davies said: 'Please, if anyone saw anything please tell the police. 'I'm sharing this with his mum's permission. 
'Since Ms Davies posted the shocking images on a local Facebook page last week, they have been shared more than 8,000 times. The youngster suffered two fat lips and was taken to hospital with a suspected broken jaw. 
Residents in the area voiced their disgust as the pictures emerged. One wrote: 'Some utter scumbags about - why oh why do people think its big and clever to kick the crap out of someone....'I hope they catch the scumbag that did this. 'Anoter said: 'What a disgusting cowardly attack on a young boy. I hope he recovers soon Physically , and I hope he isn't too traumatised by this later on.' 
Officers have also appealed for witnesses to come forward following the assault last week.
